comment:
Stayed here a few times it was so convenient to my job & theres lots of food options around & shopping  
Pretty clean & private.j would recommend I have no complaints
Great Stay as always 😊

Place is ideal for a short stay (which was our trip) due to the confined space. Small room but had its own bathroom attached which was appreciated. I found that the toilet wasn’t cleaned properly so I did that for our safety and peace of mind. I really liked the water pressure and diff features in shower faucet and the mini fridge in room came in handy to store my dog’s food. The house is quiet and the area seems to be the same way. Parking isn’t always readily available outside of the home so expect to drive around a little to catch a spot if you’re not lucky.

Stay here every time I come into town ..very clean & easy to check in 
also very close to a lot of things highly recommended

Only issue I has was when we arrived we were given the key code for someone else’s room that was already in there, took about 10 minutes or so for them to get me the correct information but overall it was a decent space for two days and for the price, I will say the only thing is the kitchen was sorta of messy like the trash can was pretty full.
great stay! convenient location, clean space, tidy and cozy.

Responsive & easy to get into 
Very clean & convenient
everything was good
Great Stay 😊
Benjamin was very responsive and helpful with questions. Walkable to various businesses. Unfortunately we did not have much time to explore as we were in town for an event.

I had to drag my luggage 0.3 miles. I had to park in a totally different area- no parking available. The safety chain was broken and I had no way of securing my room from the inside. I felt unsafe. There were no washcloths or hand towels provided- just 2 bath towels. I did not shower because I had no washcloth.
Host was quick to answer my concern about parking and directed me to a place to park. Room was clean.

The stay serve its purpose. Didn’t stay inside  much but to shower and sleep lol. The room can you use an update with a dresser or desk. Also, the linen can use an update. A person like me who has sensitive skin the linen made me feel itchy.

Overall room was clean and bathroom, common look clean but didn’t spend much time in area.
I had an absolutely fantastic experience staying at Ben’s property! From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with warm hospitality and everything was just as described, if not better.
Benjamin's place was easy to find, clean, and quiet. Great place to stay.
repeat visit
loved it
Perfect place for short stay. The shower pressure was immaculate and the place was clean! Ben was always responsive and I would stay here again.
Responsive host 👍
Cute little place to stay for a few days
Rented a room and toilet, I got that and a nice tv. Comfortable bed. Good water pressure in a good part of town.
Loved it !
very close and convenient to Luncoln Financial
would book again. clean, no frills. perfect for a few nights.
Nice room and very quiet.
Very clean, easy access, parking can be tricky but to be expected. Overall a very good choice for coming in to see the sixers!
nice little place,  make sure you look at the pictures and read about this one to know what you're getting into.
Great stay close to the stadiums!
Great place to stay in South Philly. Host was responsive when needed, bed was comfortable and the shower was great!

Fantastic stay. We flew from England to Philly for Wrestlemania and Bill was fantastic. Communicated very well and answered and solved any queries we had with regards to the place. Nice and modern, has everything it needs. If we come back to Philly, we will definitely stay here again. Thank you Bill!

I had the pleasure of staying here last weekend, and it was a great stay. I reached out earlier in the day to see if I can check in a bit early due to my arrival time, and Bill was extremely responsive and accommodating. The entryway and each room had their own keypad lock, so I never felt unsafe. Upon checking out I left my watch in the room, and when I reached back out again, Bill was responsive, super quick and let me into the room to retrieve my items. Would absolutely stay here again if I’m ever in Philly again.
￼

Great place to stay. Despite the one untalkative guest who seemed that she didn’t care or interact with the other guests during a fire alarm, stay was great.

Benjamin did a great job.

"Bill's AirBnb exceeded my expectations! The place was impeccably clean, with a particularly spotless bathroom. The room felt like a cozy home away from home, and the bed was incredibly comfortable. Despite initial doubts from reading reviews, every positive comment proved true – except for the water heater, which was actually perfect for me. The only downside, like many others, was the challenge of finding parking. Despite that, I absolutely loved my stay and would gladly return!"
Recomendado al cien !!!!
Muy bien llegar

I really enjoyed myself for 3 night stay, my gf and i had a nice time with the environment and peaceful surroundings. I would definitely recommend the stay and definitely book again. My only problem was there is cameras around the house and in the kitchen so my gf and I didn’t feel comfortable cooking or anything so we were going out and ordering food. 9/10 recommend.
Buen lugar , limpio , seguro , y accesible, me agrado la seguridad y lo limpio del lugar, el anfitrión muy atento y responde rápido

Ideally what I was looking for. The property was remarkably clean & in order. I felt as if the entire house was left to me was not bothered or distracted by any sort of commotion neither from anybody within the unit as well as outside noise. Exceeded expectations! Will be booking again!
I highly recommend this place it’s so convenient and close to everything you could need and the space is very clean, private and safe.
I loved the place , soon as you walk in it smells good . The place looks exactly like the photos and it’s easy access to get inside plus the place is very clean . I would stay again
Clean and pristine.
Was a very nice room to stay
Bill was very responsive to any requests I had, even providing me a mini fridge when I asked. I enjoyed my stay and would definitely consider staying at one of Bill's properties again.
Needed a place to stay for a internship and this spot really helped for finding a place and being close to work. Definitely recommend.

Stayed for more than a month and I really enjoyed it.
Bill is very responsive and takes actions immediately.
There’s a nearby mexican restaurant and it’s also close to grocery stores.

Will stay again next time.
Always a great stay! Bill is a wonderful host.
Excelente servicio, el lugar cómodo tenía todo lo que buscaba. Recomendado
Loved it. Will book again
Very nice place, clean and updated. The neighborhood is good, parking can be a pain. close to everything. we will probably stay again in the future when we are in that area.
Great one night stay close to the airport.

great stay as always,
comfortable, 
quiet,
clean.
comfortable, clean & quiet.
Loved the place, location isn’t the best though.
Thank you letting us stay at your place!

Clean place. Very convenient location to the football game. Walls were very thin, and the place is in the flight path of the airport, with everything that goes along with that. No way to adjust the temperature in the room.

comfortable, great stay as always. 
Highly recommend.

I had to stay here for a month and the room was exactly as described, i felt right at home and having my own bathroom and was super nice. The hosts were responsive and checked in on me to see how my stay was going and I felt very well looked after. will definitely stay here again!
always a great clean,  & safe stay

nice & clean. 
thank you.
Always a great stay!
everything was great! super clean and perfect for our night stay.

Nice , new ,clean and comfortable house. Good ,responsive host.
Thanks

This is a solid listing! It says a shared room but truthfully I did not come across anybody while staying — which works out for my introverted self. The room is solid. Bathroom and shower are good. Nice and clean all over. The Roku is also good for using as a speaker. I would recommend this for those trying to avoid Philly’s overpriced hotels. The complex area is close and Ubers from here are reasonable.
Clean and easy to access. Exactly as advertised
The location was perfect!

My wife and I booked a room because we were going to the Eagles v Steelers game. I’m an Eagles fan, she’s a Steelers fan, and the game was on our first anniversary.

We ended up with room #5, which was the larger room. We enjoyed it very much and the house isn’t too far away from other places we went like restaurants. We also Ubered everywhere once we got to the house because parking is limited. I found a spot down the street and did not move my car until we checked out lol.

We also ended up leaving a charger accidentally and Benjamin mailed it to us. Overall it was a great stay!
It’s was great nice quiet relaxing

I came to Philadelphia for a poker tournament and basically only came to the property to sleep. The suite was modern and very comfortable and had its own bathroom. There is also a shared kitchen that everyone can use. There are security cameras within shared spaces of the property which could potentially make you feel uncomfortable.
Great location, easy check in and very clean.
Great experience overall. I would recommend this AirBNB.
Benjamin is the best host, always attentive. The place is beautiful, very clean and quiet

the place is very very clean. parking can be a problem if you don't get there early. if you aren't used to big city parking you won't like it. they need one more trash can in the room. it's just one in the bathroom. walls are thin but we didn't stay in the room much. frig gets nice and cold. space heater works great.  just know it's a foam bed. I would stay again.
Es war ein schöner Aufenthalt. In dem Zimmer hat alles gepasst! Es war eine relativ ruhige Gegend. Leute die nichts gegen etwas spazieren haben sind hier genau richtig!
very neat and clean. very comfy stay. quiet and peaceful.

I enjoyed my stay. The room was nice and clean, with a private bath and television and good heat. I would have liked the shower to have been a little hotter. Other guests there were friendly and quiet.  I would go back again, and I would recommend.
Benjamin place is A1. He communicate well , responds fast and just over all a great host . Thank Yu Ben!
Great stay nice area
Great place! Very clean!
Awesome stay, the bath was amazing
The room was very nice and clean. However; there is NO onsite parking and finding parking, on the street is a challenge.
Great
Very convenient stay, easy check in responsive host, clean, well equipped and set up.
An absolutely lovely and clean place to stay! It was perfectly comfortable and exactly as advertised. I especially loved the shower! I highly recommend it.
The place was very nice and clean, I enjoyed the stay at this place it was fantastic

I am an insurance broker. I was visiting for a week and wanted to be able to work during the day in a quiet space on a solid fast reliable WiFi connection during the day. And I walked to the Eagles home opener on Monday night. And caught an $8 Uber to Citizens Bank to see the Phils on Tuesday and Thursday. Bill is quick to respond to your questions via the app and goes out of his way to make sure you have a pleasant stay. Great location. Unbeatable value!
Nice place, easy to find and access. Difficult parking
Place was clean, small but adequate enough for few days. I wish the location could’ve been at a better place.
Great place, great price, very clean.
Good

Room was as described. The shower looked updated but due to the hair from previous visitors, I didn't use the shower. The fridge leaked all over the floor and flooded my food. Luckily we were only there for one night.

The communication with the hosts is amazing. They were also very knowledgeable about the parking situation. The room was bigger than most bedrooms at hotels in Philly. The shower in the bathroom was top notch. We did not use the shared kitchen, so we do not have any feedback there but it looked clean and functional. Great place all around.

I attended the Rammstein concert in Lincoln Financial Field.
This room is very comfortable, I stayed for one night and I didn't have any issues. 
I would absolutely book Benjamin's Arbnb again.

The room was small but very comfortable and the whole place was extremely clean. It can be a bit noisy with thin walls, but I didn't feel like anything was excessive or disruptive of my sleep. The private bathroom was really great -- plenty of hot water. The neighborhood seemed quiet and safe and the Mexican restaurant across the street is delicious.
Easy and clean stay! Parking was a little hard to figure out but over all great experience
Host was really nice and quick to answer any questions we had. Went the extra mile and walked over to the spot we parked to make sure the spot was okay/legal.
Good
Nice and clean room. Near great restaurants!
Seamless stay. Easy communication, everything explained by Benjamin with no problems. Clean and nice place. Easy Uber into Central Philly. Found parking without much hassle.
much nicer and cleaner than similarly priced hotels I've stayed at! host and cleaning staff were responsive and helpful.
Benjamin is a great host, and this is my 3rd time staying and definitely a go to.
5 stars
Nice clean room with bathroom. Easy area to get around in. Wifi was spotty during my trip but able to use data on my phone
Great view of south Philly
The room/house was clean and comfortable. Great value. Perfect if you’re catching a game at the nearby stadium complex
Good bnb. It’s not in a rough area, and anytime I needed something they made sure it got fixed. Overall, I have nothing bad to say about this bnb👍🏽
Nice place.  Nice host.   very simple check in.   Parking is a serious issue.  Narrow streets, difficult to findparking.  I ended up parking about 8 blocks away.
Great place to stay!! Parking was a challenge (we knew this going into it because of other reviews), but all in all worth it.

The room was neat and clean. The television works but make sure to check if it is plugged in. The bathroom was newly remodeled and in great condition. The house was quiet. Finding parking was a bit difficult but manageable.
We enjoyed a great, quiet stay! Super easy to check ourselves in. Loved the private bath and comfy bed!
Very nice room
Great little space, very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend! 😊
Benjamin's place was great.  Photos are very accurate, clearly renovated place.  Private bedroom with en suite bathroom/shower.  Would recommend.
Can expect a great shower with a great bed. Comfortable room not freezing not hot either, everything was great!
Great stay! Close to the ballpark and super clean.
B

Really enjoyed my stay here. Benjamin was very friendly & accomodating and answered any questions I had promptly. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable I was in town to watch a Phillies game and it's hard to beat this location's value - it's within walking distance of a SEPTA stop (one stop away from the sports complex), or if you'd prefer to drive or take a rideshare to either the sports complex or to Center City, it's not a long trip at all. Parking can be tricky, as you're in a densely populated urban neighborhood, but be patient and you shouldn't have much trouble finding street parking nearby. I would definitely stay here again if the opportunity arose.
Place was amazing, enjoyed the entire stay and the neighbors in the house were friendly when passed in the hallway.
Wonderful stay ! Thanks
very clean , nice host

The accommodation was very comfortable and accurate as listed. Neighborhood is quite safe, really good transportation connection if we need to go to downtown. There are shops like Shoprite and McD that will take care of daily need. House is really clean and I had a pleasant stay here. Thanks for hosting me.
Didn’t sleep here couldn’t find parking all weekend
Good place to stay

Very nice place! The room was spacious and the bathroom was amazing! Great water pressure in the shower, good lighting, plenty of room. Check in was very easy and we were able to snag parking right outside. Convenient location, only a $10 Uber away from our destinations. Definitely will book again the next time we come to Philly.
Great place to stay. Loved it!
great stay

Great space. Small - well-priced. 
Good location - easy in and easy out. 
Benjamin is a great communicator which is vital when you're in a strange city. 
If I ever return to South Philly - I'd return to this space.
Great room and Benjamin is a great host! He would always check in on me from time to time to see if there was anything I needed and just see how I was!
Super clean and cozy! Would definitely come back next time I’m in Philly
Great location near the stadium, i rent air bnb because i need to watch coldplay concert…walk 30 min to stadium, 5 min by uber cost only 10 dollar

Indeed it is not easy to find parking in the neighborhood, but it is not impossible either. While the neighborhood does have more liters than where I live, it’s actually quite safe as I walked around quite a bit there and the community is truly multicultural with white, Asian, black, and Latinx people. The room and the whole townhouse seem to have just been recently renovated. Everything looks new and spotlessly clean. I particularly LOVE the shower head! Benjamin is also super responsive and flexible. I really enjoyed my stay.
Very good communication and very nice!
It was a great place I enjoyed my stayed
This stay was awesome! It was convenient to everything we needed! Parking was terrible but that’s obviously nothing to do with the house! I would totally stay here again!
Clean room as described. Walking distance to stadiums.
Very nice stay, would definitely come here again.

We had a really good time. The only thing is that we had to walk 20 minutes to get to the subway, not really close to the center city either. But everything was clean, and the fridge in the bedroom is a real plus.
The host did an amazing job I felt at home and helped me get situated! I highly recommend!
quiet and clean
Awesome host, awesome place and convenient will definately stay again

This place is great if you’re going to any sports/music events at the stadiums/arenas, it’s right behind them. A quick 5 mins uber($10) or a 25-30 min walk (long blocks)

This is my second AirBNB I’ve stayed at and it’s Great AirBNB and as described! Simple and  Super Clean! No extra bells or whistles! Ben does a great job on messaging fast and understands your needs, just ask him! The room and house were a clean and a secure place with cameras in the common areas as well as outside. The room I booked was very much up to date and modern. 

The neighborhood is hit or miss changes block by block,  rough areas are going west near  6th-9th streets. 5th-2nd streets are the mellow streets

Short Uber drive anywhere you want to go! Great spot seriously. I would stay here again! A+
great place to rest after a long day of work.
Clean, simple, straightforward, as represented.  Love the shower.
It’s cool.
Highly recommend, great location, private, clean, quiet.
I had a WONDERFUL stay here! Comfortable, clean+quiet.. Thanks! 😊
GREAT stay! Hosts communication was EXCELLENT! Unit was CLEAN and comfortable. It was EVERYTHING I needed. I would stay again in the future.. Thanks! 😊
Clean spot just hard to find parking
The place is great, clean quiet and highly recommended.
This place was perfect! Safe, clean, quiet. It was as advertised. Benjamin is a great host!
Pleasure staying at Benjamins location.  👍🏻
Super clean,  location is central to many attractions,  and check in/out is very simple. I made sure to park in the early afternoon and found a spot without a problem.
Great & comfortable property!
c
Always a wonderful stay at bens. Only play I stay at. Highly recommend
The park right down the street
Easy clean quiet

Had a great stay at Benjamin’s place. The home was IMMACULATE, the area was super quiet and peaceful. The shower head was amazing. Had a few issues with the hot water going out while showering, but didn’t mind so much as it was usually when the cleaning person was washing linens. Parking on a Saturday night is pretty much non existent, but not Benjamin’s fault. Room had a little private yard access as well which I absolutely loved. Everything was easily accessible via Uber at a affordable rates. 10/10 would recommend. I will definitely be staying at Benjamin’s home again. Thank you for all the prompt replies as well!  Had a great time. Oh!! and the Keurig with complimentary pods was a great touch! Mini fridge is excellent as well!!!
The place match the description and Benjamin is very responsive and always there to help. Will definitely stay again if I am ever in that area.
Always a pleasure staying at Bens! It’s our to go place always. No other place is better. You will always enjoy your stay. Always abs highly recommend
Just as pictured. Central location, close to many cute restaurants, easy place for Uber/Lyft access. Great value for a great place!

Accommodated us last minute. The room was clean and private due to sufficient locks. Location was challenging due to street parking, but thats Philly. Private bathroom was very nice and convenient. Thanks Benjamin :)
Clean, near the Philly Sixers.
Everyone was very respectful to me and my dogs as well as i was respectful and my dogs were behaved considering.
Always a great stay. The only Place we enjoy staying. Highly recommend

I was only in town for a day to see a concert at the Wells Fargo Center and for what little time I was there I had no issues during my stay. The place was about a 10 minute drive to the arena so not far at all! Benjamin was super awesome and allowed me to drop my bags off early which i appreciate so much because It allowed me to head straight over to the venue and queue in line without having to worry about my luggage. I spent the entire day queuing in line for the show so I didn’t arrive back at Benjamins place until around 11pm. His place served as a safe place for me to keep my things during the day and a quiet and peaceful environment for me to get some rest after the show which is all I was looking for! The place is very clean and you can tell it has been newly renovated! I would definitely stay again if I am ever in town
nice place to stay for a night or two
Host has everything ready for you
Great value, good location, clean place. Parking isn't the best but that's not Benjamin's fault.

This place was really great. Lots of comfy pillows, clean, and nice chill lighting. Our room even had a door to the backyard if we wanted to step outside. Bathroom was very clean and shower was really. Definitely highly recommend staying here, and I will stay here again!
Benjamin’s place is very clean and his response is very fast. Will definitely stay here again next time I come to Philly.

The room and bathroom were super clean. Benjamin sent us the door codes and check in was very easy. The mattress was very firm, but we were only staying one night so it wasn't a big deal. We were staying for a concert in South Philly and the room was the perfect distance to the venue.
Great place
Great place, parking is challenging.

Benjamin’s place is a great place to stay. This is where we always stay when we need a close place to stay. Room was clean, cozy and comfortable as always. We are always pleased to book with Benjamin.
Great stay
Great stay, parking is wild.
Nice clean close to public transportation
Very clean , modern , and comfortable!
beautiful place, room and neighborhood are safe and beautiful more than in the pictures

Clean 
Quiet and great location 
Would stay again
Everything was good, clean and comfortable.
Room was satisfactory
Felt like a high-end hotel room, clean and new. Very clean bathroom with your own personal shower. Nice clean kitchen and laundry area, dependable Host. House kept clean every day I was there.
it was okay just no heat only a little heater and it was still freezing in that room
Very clean, comfortable bed
Everything was very good clean, bed was comfortable.
Benjamin was an excellent host. Checkin was self-checkin, which is wonderful and instructions were very detailed.
Amazing place!

Me and my boyfriend stayed here for the Football game. The place was super clean and quiet. It was everything described and the best part was having our own private restroom. Benjamin was super helpful and was quick to respond to any questions we had. Will definitely be staying here again when we come back to Philly.
Great place to stay, exactly as described. Very clean and comfortable. I will definitely stay again!
Clean and cozy room with private bathroom was perfect for my weekend stay!

The room was very spacious and clean with a shower and toilet. The room was very spacious and clean with a shower and toilet, and the whole place was very quiet and comfortable. I would definitely recommend it to you. I would like to stay here again if I have the chance.
It was a nice place. Very clean neighborhood!
Nice place to stay

The space is as described. Street parking and it’s very busy, so just get there before 6. Very close to Philly sports complex. Host was communicative and check in was easy. However, my review is 1/5 because we were unable to stay in the space as upon arrival we discovered a cockroach in the bathroom. Host apologized and helped file for a refund through Airbnb support. We left immediately and had to relocate for the evening. I received a full refund the same evening.
Always an amazing stay here! So clean and quiet.
The Airbnb is great I’ve stayed a few times love the private bathroom and the privacy. Parking is a bit difficult but the space makes it tolerable
Solid rental, parking is a challenge.

You will have your own room and bathroom. Laundry room and dining area is a shared space other residents there are nice and quiet.  Beautiful clean place, looks exactly like the picture, easy check in, and quick response rate. Would definitely book again really good experience.
Great stay love this Airbnb
Would definitely recommend! Clean and has a hotel feel. Not like you are staying in a house. Would come again!

This was my second time there. The hosts were very helpful and quick to communicate. The room was quiet and the bathroom was very clean and comfortable. I would like to stay here again if I have the chance.
The room was very clean, quiet and comfortable. The area around the apartment was very safe and I felt secure. The host was also very kind. I would like to stay here again.
Great room, great prize, great contact, I'll be back for sure
Great place I really loved it

Very clean and tidy! Really private room despite being on the same floor as others. The amenities are plentiful and readily available, even for longer stays. Really enjoyed the time spent here, it was perfect for me and my partner!

Excellent place, everything clean.
We will be back.
Thanks
It was great

clean with nice private bathroom. this is more of a hostel type stay, not a private home but the guests next door were pleasant and quiet. on street parking was easy. i would definately go back. i just come to town twice a year to visit friends so i really only use airbnb as a crash pad.
Very clean, everything new, Benjamin is very responsive. Having a private bathroom is a plus.
The room is very clean and cozy. I felt comfortable. The host is friendly. I have spent a great time. I want to stay there again.
Love this place
It's so peaceful here it's like being home the other guests are respectful and it's very clean omg stay here if u need a peace of mind

Benjamin's place was great. Beautifully renovated, super clean and the shower was great. Easy to find and check in,  only downfall was parking, wasn't terrible just had to drive around a few times to find a spot,  but overall a great stay. Thanks Benjamin!
Love this place! Will come back again!!
This is a nicely renovated building with an easy check in and open communication with owner/manager , can't go wrong with this Air B B
Nice place to stay, although the room was very hot. Quiet place and seemed secure.
2nd time here and everything was clean ans perfect. Exceeds expectations.
Great place

Check is was frustrating. Host did not respond until I had to contact air BnB. Also, when I was in my room, someone was trying to enter the code and come in. I let the host know, and he didn’t respond for over 12 hours. Good thing my safety wasn’t compromised right? Room is as advertised. But..:Wouldn’t stay here again.
very clean, good area, quiet and no disturbances. Ben is a good guy, just communicate what you need to him
Benjamin was great very responsive and considerate. Easy check-in and check-out. Room was absolutely clean and so was the shared areas.
WILL LOOK FOR BENJAMINS PLACE EVERYTIME I WANT TO BOOK A BNB
5 STARSSSS EVERYTHING WAS AMAZING

Got in late from traveling and the check in process was very quick. I love that the rooms have their own private bathroom so you don’t have to share that space & Ben let me check out an hr later he is the man.
The place is clean and the check in was easy. I would recommend the place.
Great place. Clean, quiet, well decorated, comfortable.
Benjamin responded quickly and was very accommodating the place is clean and comfortable would definitely recommend

The room was nice, and close to the sports stadiums. Nothing too special just a bed, TV and a bathroom with a common shared kitchen area. Bottled water provided was nice. Unfortunately check-in was not smooth, arrived in Philly in the morning and was waiting for a few hours to receive check in instructions (keypad code, wifi, etc.) and didn't receive any communication until nearly 2:00 PM despite our check-in time being 1:00PM which was very concerning as we were forced to just wander around the city until we heard back from the host. We were unsure due to the lack of communication if we were going to have to find somewhere new to stay last minute which would have been very stressful.
This place was great i highly recommend it
Great stay, everything was clean and check-in was as easy as getting the codes from the host. Good value for the location.

Benjamin’s place is immaculately clean and organized , private bathrooms makes it a perfect addition  and laundry downstairs is a pleasant surprise . Attentive housekeepers and great overall experience with this stay  ☺️
The room is Highly recommended.
Exceeded our expectations, will stay here again when my boyfriend visits.

Loved this place, was really private and quiet. Nice bed and pillows. Awesome shower(I fell in love with the shower) 🤩. Looks like a hotel inside with the doors with number lock to get in and you have your own bathroom. Nice TV Roku and really spacious room. My man and I stayed only one night for the Eagles NFL Game and it was so close to the stadium. The only not so good was looking for a parking spot, it took us about 10min driving. But honestly I don't mind the parking spot bcz It wasn't that hard(just a little) but it was an amazing room. I will totally recommend and possibly come back for the next game
